meta.name: Make a horizontal scroll section with HTML, CSS and JavaScript
meta.excerpt: A horizontal section is a section which spreads left to right. It is very elegant and takes less space and can show more data.

meta.name: Why I chose SvelteKit over Gatsby
meta.excerpt: SvelteKit is bleeding edge, blazing fast. Gastby is slow, atleast for me.

meta.name: Differences between SSG and SSR, also when to use them
meta.excerpt: Learn about SSG and SSR, and what you should use.
